block_info.label: FIR Interpolation
block_info.description: FIR Asymmetric Interpolation filter block for AI Engines.

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: Select the input or output data type from the dropdown.
parameters.label: Input/Output data type:

parameters.name: coef_type
parameters.description: Select the data type for the filter coefficients from the dropdown
parameters.label: Filter coefficients data type:

parameters.name: use_coeff_reload
parameters.description: Select this option to enable coefficient reloading at runtime
parameters.label: Specify filter coefficients via input port

parameters.name: num_outputs
parameters.description: The number of output ports. Windows API output an exact copy of the data. Stream API interleaves the output data with a 128-bit pattern.
parameters.label: Provide second set of output ports

parameters.name: fir_length
parameters.description: Specify fir length for coefficient reloading
parameters.label: Filter length:

parameters.name: interpolate_factor
parameters.description: Enter the value of the interpolation factor.
parameters.label: Interpolation factor:

parameters.name: input_window_size
parameters.description: Enter the number of samples in the input window. The number of samples in the output window will depend on the FIR filter parametersEnter the number of samples in the input window. The number of samples in the output window will depend on the FIR filter parameters.
parameters.label: Input window size (Number of samples):

parameters.name: shift_val
parameters.description: A power of 2 shift-down is applied to the FIR accumulation before output.
parameters.label: Scale output down by 2^:

parameters.name: rnd_mode
parameters.description: Select a rounding mode from the dropdown.
parameters.label: Rounding mode:

parameters.name: sat_mode
parameters.description: Select a saturation mode from the dropdown.
parameters.label: Saturation mode:

parameters.name: interp_poly
parameters.description: The number of parallel polyphases to decompose over
parameters.label: Number of interpolator polyphases:

parameters.name: TP_API
parameters.description: The form of IO: 0 for windows, 1 for streams
parameters.label: API:

parameters.name: dual_ip
parameters.description: TP_DUAL_IP allows 2 stream inputs to be connected to FIR, increasing available throughput. When set to 0, single stream input will be connected to FIR kernel, when set to 1, both input stream ports will be used.
parameters.label: Dual IP:

parameters.name: ssr
parameters.description: TP_SSR specifies the number of parallel input/output paths where samples are interleaved between paths, giving an overall higher throughput.
parameters.label: SSR:
